title: 09/01/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 09/01/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to the Boston Globe’s Ben Volin about why the Patriots decided to go with Mac Jones. Was it with the intent to recreate their previous situation? MLB Network’s Sean Casey explained why getting boo’d is not necessarily a bad thing. And Pro Football Focus’ Mike Renner tells us which 3 QBs will be 1st round picks in the 2022 NFL Draft.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
